snippet.title: Bus Simulator 18: Multiplayer Trailer (EN)
snippet.description:
With our official multiplayer trailer of Bus Simulator 18 we offer a closer look at the game’s cooperative multiplayer mode today. Have a good time watching!

Bus Simulator 18 for PC will be first available on June 13, 2018 in retail and digital stores. The recommended sales price will be 29.99 Euro, 34.99 USD, 26.99 GBP.


For more information visit:

Homepage: http://www.bussimulator-game.com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BusSimulatorGame/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BusSimGame

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bussimgame/

Steam Link: http://store.steampowered.com/app/515180/Bus_Simulator_18/

Discord: https://discord.gg/astragon
